name: Commonspaces
tagline: A public campaign to create civic hacker/maker spaces in public libraries in communities of all sizes.
body:
# Project Goals
To work with Libraries, Archives, Museums and Universities to transform legacy public facilities into centers of high-tech creativity

## Project Components
* **[PaperMachine-DIYBookScanner](http://code4maine.org/papermachine/)**-Collect and compile a directory of online resources pertaining production of low-cost, accessible “DIY Book Scanner”
* **[Project Wiki](https://github.com/Code4Maine/commonspaces/wiki)**

## Locations

  * **[Bangor](https://github.com/Code4Maine/commonspaces/wiki/Bangor)**

  * **[Brunswick-Bath](https://github.com/Code4Maine/commonspaces/wiki/Brunswick-Bath)**

  * **[Portland](https://github.com/Code4Maine/commonspaces/wiki/Portland)**


### A Code for Maine Project
[Learn more about Code for Maine](www.codeformaine.org)
